name: part_007
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭2025】PuPPet~ポルカのおもちゃ箱~【尾丸ポルカ⧸ホロライブ】 [a4T91LLjjJw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Our Bright Parade'.
MC section where Polka thanks Fuwawa and Mococo.

subtitles.original: 遠く暗がりに灯った
subtitles.english: Lit in the distant darkness

subtitles.original: それは 眩し過ぎた名前
subtitles.english: It's a name that was far too bright

subtitles.original: それは 優し過ぎる思い出 もっと
subtitles.english: It's a memory that's far too kind, more...

subtitles.original: 近づけると 手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: Reaching out my hand as I get closer

subtitles.original: 思いがけず 結び合った
subtitles.english: Unexpectedly, we were joined together

subtitles.original: ほら 今 迷子は “僕等”になった
subtitles.english: Look, now the lost child has become "us"

subtitles.original: Parade, Parade, Parade! 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, Parade, Parade! It's going to shine

subtitles.original: 悔しさも 愛しさも 連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring the regrets and the love along

subtitles.original: 風、夢、羽 飛び立てるさ
subtitles.english: Wind, dreams, wings - we can take flight

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈りは 光 終わりなき兆し
subtitles.english: Small prayers are light, an endless omen

subtitles.original: 君を見つけたこと 胸を張れるよ
subtitles.english: I can be proud of having found you

subtitles.original: ここから これから Our Bright Parade, Parade!
subtitles.english: From here, from now on, Our Bright Parade, Parade!

subtitles.original: まだ 頼りない予感を
subtitles.english: With feelings that are still unreliable

subtitles.original: 歌おう 恥ずかしくなんてないよ
subtitles.english: Let's sing, there's nothing to be ashamed of

subtitles.original: 誰も解けない イマジナリー
subtitles.english: An imaginary world no one can solve

subtitles.original: いつかまた逢える おまじない
subtitles.english: A lucky charm so we can meet again someday

subtitles.original: あの日 ゼロに始まった ストーリー
subtitles.english: The story that started at zero that day

subtitles.original: 数え切れない 言の葉 数えるような想いじゃないさ
subtitles.english: Countless words, not the kind of feelings you can count

subtitles.original: ほら 今 僕らを一つと呼ぼう
subtitles.english: Look, now let's call us one

subtitles.original: Parade, Parade, Parade! 美しいんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, Parade, Parade! It's beautiful

subtitles.original: 許し合える刹那 夜はきらめく
subtitles.english: In the moment of mutual forgiveness, the night sparkles

subtitles.original: 雨、晴れ、カレイド またとない空
subtitles.english: Rain, clear skies, a kaleidoscope, a sky like no other

subtitles.original: 相応しい旅路とは 君と在ることさ
subtitles.english: A worthy journey is being with you

subtitles.original: 君と在ることなんだ
subtitles.english: It's being with you

subtitles.original: “ただいま”を聞けば “おかえり”って叫ぶよ
subtitles.english: If I hear "I'm home," I'll shout "Welcome back"

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃないか
subtitles.english: Isn't that obvious?

subtitles.original: Parade, Parade, Parade! 輝くんだよ 暗がりを満たすのは 君だ 僕だ!
subtitles.english: Parade, Parade, Parade! It's going to shine. What fills the darkness is you and me!

subtitles.original: Parade, Parade, Parade! 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, Parade, Parade! It's going to shine

subtitles.original: 悔しさも 愛しさも 連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring the regrets and the love along

subtitles.original: 風、夢、羽 飛び立てるさ
subtitles.english: Wind, dreams, wings - we can take flight

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈りは 光 終わりなき兆し
subtitles.english: Small prayers are light, an endless omen

subtitles.original: 君と飛び込んでゆく 素敵なスタートさ
subtitles.english: Jumping in with you is a wonderful start

subtitles.original: ここから これから Our Bright Parade, Parade!
subtitles.english: From here, from now on, Our Bright Parade, Parade!

subtitles.original: Our Bright Parade, Parade!
subtitles.english: Our Bright Parade, Parade!

subtitles.original: ふわ、もこ、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Fuwa, Moco, thank you!

subtitles.original: おー！
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: かわいい
subtitles.english: So cute

subtitles.original: Hello Hello Everyone
subtitles.english: Hello Hello Everyone

subtitles.original: まもなく On Stage
subtitles.english: Soon on stage

subtitles.original: ライライ自己暗示さ
subtitles.english: Lie-lie self-suggestion

subtitles.original: 始めよう
subtitles.english: Let's begin

subtitles.original:
ペルソナ
作詞・作曲・編曲：uma vs. モリモリあつし
subtitles.english:
Persona
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: uma vs. Morimori Atsushi

subtitles.original: ようこそ PARTY NIGHT
subtitles.english: Welcome to PARTY NIGHT

subtitles.original: 誰かが語る
subtitles.english: Someone is telling a story

subtitles.original: 連日満員御礼 どうぞお気兼ねなく
subtitles.english: Full house every day, please feel free

subtitles.original: 待ってた SHOW TIME
subtitles.english: The awaited SHOW TIME

subtitles.original: 誰かが騙る
subtitles.english: Someone is deceiving

subtitles.original: どうでもいいような 顔を見せてよ
subtitles.english: Show me a face that doesn't matter

subtitles.original: 偶像捏造 炎上 並べたなら一攫千金
subtitles.english: Idol fabrication, controversy, line them up for a quick fortune

subtitles.original: ふざけちゃいませんか？
subtitles.english: Won't you have some fun?

subtitles.original: 今 辿り着いた
subtitles.english: I've arrived now

subtitles.original: 憧れの世界
subtitles.english: The world I longed for

subtitles.original: ここは まるで ペテン師の楽園
subtitles.english: It's like a swindler's paradise

subtitles.original: 吐き気を 飲み込む
subtitles.english: Swallowing the nausea

subtitles.original: 前略 幕が開けた そのオノマトペ
subtitles.english: Omission, the curtain has risen, that onomatopoeia

subtitles.original: 欠片る人形(ヒトガタ)は ピエロに口付けを
subtitles.english: The broken dolls, give the clown a kiss

subtitles.original: 本日大団円 脚本が笑う
subtitles.english: A grand finale today, the script is laughing

subtitles.original: 騙されてくれる あなた達と
subtitles.english: With you all who let yourselves be deceived

subtitles.original: アタシ 今 ここで 何をしてる？
subtitles.english: What am I doing here now?

subtitles.original: 耳を劈(つんざ)く
subtitles.english: Ear-splitting

subtitles.original: 拍手喝采
subtitles.english: Applause and cheers

subtitles.original: 猿も踊る
subtitles.english: Even monkeys dance
